subject: I'm back, too
author: lalarutabaga
full_text:
Hi, guys--
I've so missed you all and have missed recording more than I can say. 
After the holiday stress and stopping to avoid bad voices, my mom went 
into the hospital two weeks ago, and I've been there since, doing 
little else but thinking of ITC constantly.  I'm going to start 
recording again tonight (I've never recorded at night before), and I 
ask you guys for the ITC equivalent of prayers as I try to jump back in.
Lots of love to you all,
Ursula
